extendedInfo.description: Graphical benchmark program that measures 2D frames per second (fps). Shows instant, average, log10 histogram, and std. deviation of frame rate.Normal results are: avg 58-60fps, a bell shaped histogram, and stdev under 10. Details are dumped to LogCat. See web site for Droid 2.1 update discussion.3.1.0: Added stdev

reviews.comment: All of you who say you are getting above 30fps on evo are liars.evo is limited to 30fps and unless your phone is rooted and your a coder there isnofix
